summary: June 20 is the 171st day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
June 20 is the 171st day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar. There are 194 days remaining until the end of the year.
In the Northern Hemisphere, the Summer solstice sometimes occurs on this date, while the Winter solstice occurs in the Southern Hemisphere.
title: June 20
